verses.roman:
prema-bhakti diyā teṅho bhāsā'la jagate
tāṅra caritra loke nā pāre bujhite

synonyms: prema-bhakti—devotional service; diyā—giving; teṅho—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; bhāsā'la—overflooded; jagate—in the world; tāṅra—His; caritra—character; loke—people; nā—not; pāre—able; bujhite—to understand.
translation: Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu overflooded the entire world by distributing transcendental loving service. No one can understand His character and activities.
